comment:
Single step infusion mash with 1 tsp amylase and supercharger, stabilized at 149F x 1h. Step-sparged x 30min at 165-170F. 
Initial OG: 1.065 (adjusted) (had to add about 200-250g of LME because initial OG was too low)
Wort volume 5.5 gallons
FG: 1.024 after 7 days fermentation (lingering fermentation seems to go on)
